articles.author: Hope Sloop
articles.title: Kevin Costner Gets Support From 5 of His Kids at 'Horizon: An American Saga' Premiere - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Kevin Costner hit the 'Horizon: An American Saga' premiere on Monday with five of his seven children in tow!
articles.content:
Kevin Costner's kids are his biggest fans! 
On Monday night, the actor, 69, attended the premiere for his new film, Horizon: An American Saga, in Los Angeles, and was joined by five of his seven chi… [+3328 chars]
